get.summary: Returns the named asset associated to the given robot key.
get.description:
OAuth required scopes: OR.Assets or OR.Assets.Read.

Required permissions: Assets.View.
DEPRECATED: 
Use the GetRobotAssetByNameForRobotKey endpoint. Kept for backwards compatibility.
Please refer to https://docs.uipath.com/orchestrator/reference

parameters.name: robotId
parameters.description: The key of the robot for which the asset is being fetched.

parameters.name: assetName
parameters.description: The name of the asset being fetched.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Indicates the related entities to be represented inline. The maximum depth is 2.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Limits the properties returned in the result.

404.description: Asset or Robot do not exist or the Asset is not available for the specified robot.
